b'Qin Shi Ming Yue: Bai Bu Fei Jian': b'Set during the Qin Dynasty in ancient China, a brave assassin attempts to kill the Emperor to save his homeland. However, the assassin fails and in retaliation, the Emperor sends his troops to kill his eight year old son. A highly skilled swordsman intervenes and rescues the boy. After their escape from the forces of the Emperor, they embark on a journey to change the destiny of the empire while encountering several friends and foes along the way. '

[b'Qin Shi Ming Yue: Ye Jin Tianming', b'Qin Shi Mingyue Zhi Jingke Waizhuan', b'Qin Shi Ming Yue 3D: Dianying Longteng Wanli', b'Qin Shi Ming Yue: Kong Shan Niao Yu', b'Qin Shi Ming Yue Zhi: Luosheng Tangxia', b'Qin Shi Ming Yue Tebie Pian: Di Zi Jiang Xi', b'Qin Shi Ming Yue: Tian Xing Jiu Ge']
